name: Ketchup
description: We all love catching up with friends, but hey, life gets busy. Ketchup will actually make you a better friend by nudging you at the right times to reach out to friends.
about: Download the Ketchup iOS app. No contacts permissions. Minimal analytics. All the texts, phone calls, emails, etc are done through iOS, so the app canâ€™t access that information at all. And lastly the app is open source so anyone can verify all the above ðŸ˜‡
